import React, { useState } from 'react' import ReactHtmlParser from 'react-html-parser' import { level, getCategoryClass, generateMedia } from './utils' import * as Styled from './Card.styles' const Card = props => { const { difficulty, tags, prompt, prompt_media, answer_media, answer } = props.data const { isActive, navClickHandler, position } = props; const levelData = level(difficulty) const categoryClass = getCategoryClass(tags[0] || 'Uncategorized') const [activeSide, setActiveSide] = useState('front') const [isCurrent, setIsCurrent] = useState(isActive) const media = activeSide === 'front' ? prompt_media.map(item => generateMedia(item)) : answer_media.map(item => generateMedia(item)) return (
 {levelData.text}

{activeSide === 'front' ? `Question #${position + 1}` : `Answer #${position + 1}`}

{tags && tags.length ? tags.map((tag, i) => (  {tag} )) : null}
{ ReactHtmlParser(activeSide === 'front' ? prompt : answer) }
{ media }
{/* {/* className="peach-bg-gradient"> */} {/*
) } export default Card;
